short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fierce dragon soars above the clouds, carrying a poised warrior in traditional kimono.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The landscape below is equally awe-inspiring, with the sun rising behind majestic snow-capped mountains and casting a golden glow over ancient pagodas. This scene blends the mythical allure of dragons with the tranquility of traditional Japanese culture, offering a sense of adventure, beauty, and serenity every time you open a new tab.
